AddForm.not_preffer: I can take, but preffer not

BuildTeam.average_artillery: Has an average amount of artillery
BuildTeam.are_u_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this player from your house?

SettingsPage.name: Name
SettingsPage.house_description: We need to know what is your House Discord. Make sure Konquerus is on your discord. By this ID we know on what server Konquerus should work. If you want to change house name, type to support.
SettingsPage.member_description: What is your Discord member role name and his DiscordID. By this ID Konquerus knows who is a member of your house.
SettingsPage.logs_description: Channels or channel to see logs about actions on discord and attendance on TW after event. You can use the same channel or even channel Thread.
SettingsPage.tw_zone_description: We need to know if you play TW on the main DC server or a different one.
SettingsPage.lineup_description: Bot needs to know how to split your house into lineups if you have more than one raid.

step1.title: Navigate to the House Tab
step1.description: Go to the "House" tab in the application.

houseName.title: House Name:
houseName.description: Must be unique. No more than 15 characters.

country.title: Country:
country.description: Select the country from the dropdown list.

avatar.title: Avatar:
avatar.description: Use an image hosting service like imgur.com. Paste the link to the image. Image size should be 180x180 pixels.

server.title: Server:
server.description: Fill in the server settings form.

serverDiscordId.title: Server Discord ID:
serverDiscordId.description: Enter the Discord ID of the server.

memberRole.title: Member Role Name and ID:
memberRole.description: Provide the name and ID of the member role.

logsChannels.title: Logs Channels or Channel:
logsChannels.description: Specify the logs channels or a single channel.

twZone.title: TW Zone:
twZone.description: Enter the Server Discord ID for the TW zone. Provide the Member role ID.

step6.title: Verify House Settings
step6.description: Use the command to verify your House settings from the website. Navigate to
step6.command: and click the button to verify.

guide_2.title: Konquerus Bot User Guide
guide_2.slash_command: Slash Command is used by typing / in the Discord chat.
guide_2.menu_eng_description: Creates buttons to control the bot. Requires admin rights on the Discord server or at least the RightHand rank on ConqSite.
guide_2.send_presence: Send the presence: sends players from attendance lists at TW to the builder on ConqSite.
guide_2.quick_add: Quick add: manually add a player to the whitelist on ConqSite.
guide_2.delete_player: Delete player: manually remove a player from the whitelist on ConqSite.
guide_2.add_all: Add all: adds all players from the server to ConqSite (recommended to use only once during setup).
guide_2.verification: Verification: checks if the IDs set in the ConqSite settings are correct.
guide_2.functions_description: The Konquerus bot allows for automatic management of roles on the Discord server and attendance lists on ConqSite.
guide_2.auto_roles: Automatically add/remove roles to/from the whitelist on ConqSite.
guide_2.check_logs: Check channel logs and player lists for TW events.
guide_2.create_presence_lists: Create attendance lists from voice channels.
guide_2.warthog_description: Function that moves a user through all voice channels from top to bottom.
guide_2.warthog_example: Example usage: to move a player through channels for moderation purposes.
guide_2.installation_steps: To start using the bot, follow these steps:
guide_2.step2: Add the Konqueruś bot to your Discord server.
guide_2.step3: Go to settings on ConqSite and set the appropriate IDs: House, Member, Logs, TW Zone, Lineups.
guide_2.step4: On Discord, use the /menu_eng command and press the Verification button.
guide_2.polish_version_functions: Functions available only in the Polish version:
guide_2.create_event_groups: Create groups for events such as raid camps.
guide_2.auto_verification: Automatically verify presence in voice channels.
